name: Hapag-Lloyd
title: Java Software Engineer
description:
I am currently a working student at Hapag-Lloyd and received a scholarship for my university. I am working in the Network Operations and Analytics team.

- Implementing backend features in projects running on Java Jakarta EE and Payara.
- Analyzing and processing logs with the Elasticsearch ELK Stack to track usage statistics.
- Writing documentation for existing workflows

name: Atlantis DX
title: Full Stack Web Developer
description:
As a working student I contributed to the E-Commerce team at Atlantis DX, with Eventim as a key client.

- Developed and maintained front-end and back-end functionalities using PHP, JavaScript, and CSS.
- Helped translate front-end texts to allow multi-language support.
- Worked extensively with Adobe Magento, ensuring seamless integrations and optimizations for the online store.
- Enhanced user experience by implementing consistent UI/UX improvements.
- Ensured smooth functionality across different components while maintaining a focus on performance and scalability.
